title: Map drawn from memory helps reunite kidnapped Chinese man with family
description: Li Jingwei was kidnapped in Yunnan province in 1989 and sold to a family thousands of miles away.

title: Safe standing: 'My opinion has completely changed'
description: On Sunday standing sections for fans in England's top flight return after almost 30 years. How will they change the matchday experience and terrace culture?

title: 2022 sporting calendar: Big events from Winter Olympics to the World Cup
description: The Winter Olympics, Commonwealth Games, Women's Euros and the men's World Cup are just some of the big events taking place in 2022.

title: After Desmond Tutu, a time for new South African heroes
description: As the last of South Africa's moral giants is laid to rest, some say now is time to break the mould.

title: Colorado: Residents return following devastating fire
description: Tens of thousands of people in Boulder County were forced to flee their homes on Thursday.

title: Fireworks and Big Ben mark subdued UK new year amid Covid spread
description: Public events to see in 2022 were scrapped in London and Edinburgh amid the spread of Omicron.

title: Betty White: Biden leads tributes for Golden Girls actress
description: The long-time Hollywood star died on Friday at the age of 99 after an eight-decade film and TV career.

title: Covid: More restrictions a last resort, Sajid Javid says
description: The health secretary believes the country must look to "live alongside" coronavirus in 2022.

title: ARFID: 'My son's not a picky eater; he's scared of food'
description: Families say they face accusations of bad parenting over their children's little-known condition.

title: Victim Support: My daughter was murdered - sharing my grief helps others
description: Radio 4 Today guest editor Mina Smallman, whose daughters were murdered last year, focuses on Victim Support.

title: Three ways to be more rational this year
description: Harvard psychology professor Steven Pinker discusses three common irrationality traps and offers advice on how to avoid them.

title: The Papers: Queen's Covid heroes and curbs a 'last resort'
description: The front pages celebrate the people recognised in the New Year Honours list while ushering in 2022.

title: What can we expect in politics in 2022?
description: The BBC's political team talk through what stories might make the headlines in 2022.

title: Trainee stuntmen learning to dive show off their skills
description: Aspiring stuntmen learn to dive as part of their quest to be included on the British Stunt Register.

title: 'Our skate park shut down so we built our own'
description: Girls' Night offers a safe place where women can skateboard and socialise.

title: California's fires threaten to ravage mighty sequoia forests
description: The fierce fires devastating California threaten its ancient forest of giant sequoia trees.
